price: (Abraham) danee ne ho kͻͻ wͻn abosom no ho ka kyerεε (abosom no) sε: “Monni di?
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
